item.title: TIL: Swap panes on TMUX
item.description: :til: :tmux: To move pane left or right <prefix> { or <prefix> } key sequence can be used.

item.title: TIL: TMUX pane management
item.description: :til: :tmux: Inside any pane, press <Prefix>! and tmux will create a new window from your pane, removing the original pane. Now, to move the first window into a pane in the second window, press <Prefix>: to enter Command mode, and type this: :join-pane -s panes:1 or :join-pane -s :1 You can use this technique to move panes around as well.
